definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in

special administrative region (SAR), of which there are two in the PRC: Hong Kong 香港 and Macau 澳門|澳门/refers to many different areas during late Qing, foreign occupation, warlord period and Nationalist government/refers to special zones in North Korea and Indonesia

pinyin: ping2 shen3 tuan2 te4 bie2 jiang3

definition: Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region
pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 fu3 Zhu4 Xiang1 gang3 Te4 bie2 Xing2 zheng4 qu1 Lian2 luo4 Ban4 gong1 shi4
containing_words.word: 中央人民政府駐香港特別行政區聯絡辦公室

definition: Hanseong Special Metropolitan City, old name for Seoul, capital of Korea
Jeju island special autonomous province, South Korea, a World Heritage site
pinyin: Ji4 zhou1 te4 bie2 zi4 zhi4 dao4

definition: Special Duties Unit, Hong Kong special police
special guest performer (in a show)/special guest appearance (in film credits)
special drawing rights (SDR), international currency of the IMF

pinyin: gu3 dong1 te4 bie2 da4 hui4

definition: Shuanghu special district, Tibetan: Mtsho gnyis don gcod khru'u, in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
Seoul Special Metropolitan City, official name of the capital of South Korea

sentences.english: Is there any special Tenimyu you're longing for?
sentences.chinese: 是否特別期待某一部舞臺劇？

sentences.english: It did my heart good to hear about your promotion to Vice President of the agency.
sentences.chinese: 得知你提升爲經銷處副總經理，我心裏特別高興。

sentences.english: So, typically, we use cross product to find plane equations.
sentences.chinese: 特別地，可以用外積來求平面方程。

sentences.english: Continuously track and monitor key contract clauses for risks and mitigations.
sentences.chinese: 對合同的特別條款進行有效跟蹤。

sentences.english: Women get off on judging each other, especially their very own friends.
sentences.chinese: 女人天性心愛品論他人，特別是評論自己的好朋友。

sentences.english: " You this bag is very special, fell into the water and no water wet".
sentences.chinese: “你這個包還真是很特別，掉進水裏也沒進水溼掉”。

sentences.english: No one could account for the fact that one of the boxes was extremely heavy.
sentences.chinese: 此中有隻箱子特別重，可誰也弄不清是怎麼回事。

sentences.english: The Texas system challenged by Ms. Fisher is idiosyncratic.
sentences.chinese: 受到費舍女士挑戰的德克薩斯錄取系統非常特別。

sentences.english: Has the special rich fragrance, the feeling in the mouth like abalone, extremely lubricates tastily .
sentences.chinese: 有特別的濃香，口感如鮑魚，極潤滑爽口。

sentences.english: Two special units focusing on initial and final consonant clusters.
sentences.chinese: 包含兩個特別的單元，提供字首與字尾子音羣的練習。

sentences.english: The new government imposed a special tax  on imported wines.
sentences.chinese: 新政府對進口酒徵收特別稅。

sentences.english: I love their Asian desserts, particularly the hot tofu with sweet ginger sauce.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡他們的亞洲甜點，特別是甜薑汁熱豆腐。

sentences.english: These policies will affect non-whites especially.
sentences.chinese: 這些政策對非白種人的影響特別大。

sentences.english: All kinds of medicine to eat, especially those containing hormone medicine.
sentences.chinese: 各種藥都要少喫，特別是一些含有激素的藥。

sentences.english: Santanas, especially the new 2000models, have become big sellers.
sentences.chinese: 桑塔納，特別是現代2000，擁有衆多的買家。

sentences.english: We ought not to need the exhortation: it should be our constant habit all the day and every day.
sentences.chinese: 這應該是基督徒每日的習慣，無需特別耳提面命。

definition: to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
